topic.title: I am new in ZeroNet.Plz help me.
topic.body:
1.Where can I see any formal ZeroNet document that describes the detail about encryption of connection?

A available document i can found is a google docs in zeronet.io/docs.
It's informative but too less details.
I'd like to contribute my codes, but i don't now where to begin. 

2.how can i set up a zeronet tracker.
https://www.npmjs.com/package/zeronet-tracker is a solution.
but how can i set up a bootstrap tracker to serve tracker list?
It's for the concern about the GFW's blocking.

3.the enemies of a distribution network are  trash nodes and honeypots,how can  trackers prevent it?

1565411669_16YKCPxCUyjP3zF1CNtsWCHu44Toa.body: I am facing the problem, too.

1565449212_1G2nXDHaHSiL2SV5w9jy1tWddBS5E.body: re: I know bootstrap plugin can cache peers,but i wish to set up  reliable  tracker server.

1565342542_16vtDQkRKY8atc9K3oCBTvMW1ojLL.body:
buy a HDD and a SATA to USB cable.
use dd command in Linux.

> [xcape2net](#comment_251_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): The bigger problem is that each time a new person starts using ZeroNet, he'll have download from peers several Gigabytes of data just for ZeroTalk.  If old ZeroTalk data can't be removed, that will render ZeroNet nearly unusable.  It's the same problem that we see with the bitcoin blockchain now taking up a few hundred Gigabytes.

Lightning Network may help

1565095300_1PnHUGmQkYq4NKZBxFp8o1Wb1ZZij.body: China is no longer a socialist country. Hong Kong’s big chaebol is protected by the Chinese government. The gap between the rich and the poor continues to widen, housing prices remain high, and youth have no future. These are the root causes of unrest.

1565639606_1Hb5zuymuNq9rhYhhoYuAPGMXpxsp.body:
> [crazylime](#comment_66_1D9oYXWZH2S55PeoCFDKTqq8roNXqZqP7n): Helping people and sharing is neither a communist or capitalist system because there is no central government.  All the problems of communism stem from a central government and the authority it forces on people (e.g., taking private property away from people, inhibiting free speech.)   [...]

communist society is absence of social classes, money, and the state.

> [ntp](#comment_11_185ieYf6sEZrW5juQmXsp5nfajWYTdwPaD): Communism IS the dictatorship of the workers class over the other classes.

https://www.marxists.org/archive/lenin/works/1917/staterev/ch05.htm#s2
"Socialism"(i.e. the first parse of communism) and "communism" are two different things.

1565645808_1NkqJSocDr3nAa6WWDCAHgtf3ftwB.body:
> [hggggfff](#comment_20_1GUhkGiS4PmRreV33ddFfEMqfdgjJGpn9Y): tl;dr:• Communism is by definition ANTIDEMOCRATIC(it's an "revolutionary" ideology, this means: They do not even try to get into power by vote, but by revolution aka coup. As you can confirm by looking at the history of pretty much all communist countries in human history)• Communism is by definition IMPERIALISTIC(the goal of abanoning nations is on top priority, you can't abandon all nations without first conquering all, they want the whole world, not just a country)• Communism is by implication AUTHORITARIAN(having a central authority telling you what to work as and what to produce and then how the goods you produce will be used and who gets them — of course there is that fairy tale story that once the people are brainwashed enough you can abandon the state and the system will keep itself afloat, but thats unrealistic thinking and no communist country was ever even close — in reality, we know how communist countries look like — North Korea)

copy and paste is so boring

1565638691_1Hb5zuymuNq9rhYhhoYuAPGMXpxsp.body: Die Waffe der Kritik kann allerdings die Kritik der Waffen nicht ersetzen, die materielle Gewalt muss gestürzt werden durch materielle Gewalt, allein auch die Theorie wird zur materiellen Gewalt, sobald sie die Massen ergreift.

1565847129_16YKCPxCUyjP3zF1CNtsWCHu44Toa.body: I am using LUKS and  Secure-deletetion Toolkit now.

1565908709_1KUSKrffaR1sfLwxZUXUPshLpKhh5.body: ZeroNet is under GPLv2.So you can write a new one form the source code.
